 PREV CLASS   NEXT CLASS FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.fluidops.iwb.model
Annotation Type ParameterConfigDoc

@Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ParameterConfigDoc

documents configuration parameters (e.g. for widgets and providers)

Author:
ango

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String desc
          the description of the parameter
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String defaultValue
          default value of the parameter if exists, empty string is the default value.
 java.lang.Class<?> listType
          the class of the elements of the list, if the data type is list, otherwise VOID.class (default)
 boolean required
          defines if the parameter is required, important for the validation in the widget configuration form, default is false
 java.lang.String[] selectValues
          select values if the form type is a dropdown box, e.g selectValues={"on","off"} , empty array is the default
 ParameterConfigDoc.Type type
          the type of the parameter.
 com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm.Validation validation
          required validation for the input field.
 

Element Detail

desc

public abstract java.lang.String desc
the description of the parameter

required

public abstract boolean required
defines if the parameter is required, important for the validation in the widget configuration form, default is false

Default:
false

defaultValue

public abstract java.lang.String defaultValue
default value of the parameter if exists, empty string is the default value.

Default:
""

type

public abstract ParameterConfigDoc.Type type
the type of the parameter. It defines the UI controls that are used for input/output If the annotated field is boolean a combobox with select values 'false/true' is offered in the widget configuration form no matter which type is set

Default:
com.fluidops.iwb.model.ParameterConfigDoc.Type.SIMPLE

selectValues

public abstract java.lang.String[] selectValues
select values if the form type is a dropdown box, e.g selectValues={"on","off"} , empty array is the default

Default:
{}

validation

public abstract com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm.Validation validation
required validation for the input field. No validation is the default

Default:
com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm.Validation.NONE

listType

public abstract java.lang.Class<?> listType
the class of the elements of the list, if the data type is list, otherwise VOID.class (default)

Default:
java.lang.Void.class
